info.author: Panu Kalliokoski
info.description:
This package implements a set of classes to abstract the bookkeeping required by
multiplexing I/O with the system call select().  On top of that, it also
provides a framework for implementing TCP servers.
info.name: Selecting
info.summary: Object-based abstraction over the system call select()
info.html_description: This package implements a set of classes to abstract the bookkeeping required by multiplexing I/O with the system call select(). On top of that, it also provides a framework for implementing TCP servers.
